LanguageData.BulletCasingfilthTooltip: If enabled pawns shooting will cause bullet causing filth to appear near them
LanguageData.BulletCasingVelocityFactorTooltip: The base is about half a cell, the numbers are a range from which a number is chose randomly for each casing and multiplied with the distance it flies
LanguageData.BulletCasingUseWeaponRotation: Use weapon rotation to determine casing direction
LanguageData.BulletCasingUseWeaponRotationTooltip: If on the casings will fly depending on the rotation of the pawn and where he/she is aiming (like top-down view). If off the casings will always fly to the right side and down (like side view).
LanguageData.BulletCasingUncapCasingSizeTooltip: Makes casing size scale indefinitely with weapon damage if on, otherwise casing size only scales to a certain point with weapon damage.
